about_the_game:
Axe, Bow & Staff: The Soundtrack by Kazuhiko Naruse (a.k.a. naruto).

Enjoy 1 hour and 10 minutes of chiptunes as 320kbp/s MP3 files in the game folder on your computer:

01 Title
02 Axe Theme
03 Bow Theme
04 Staff Theme
05 Cave
06 Rat Boss
07 Goblin Base
08 Goblin Boss
09 Valley
10 Skeleton Boss
11 Elevator
12 Castle
13 Axe Theme Remix
14 Bow Theme Remix
15 Staff Theme Remix
16 Desert
17 Final Battle
18 End
19 World Map
20 Item Shop
21 Game Over
22 Level Complete
